entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentSet<T> #110825
  • Hang during 'ComWrappers.TryGetOrCreateObjectForComInstanceInternal()' on Native AOT #110823
  • Number of packets is significantly increased for inbound and outbound calls from .NET 8 to .NET 9 #110822
  • Class `Vector3` field assignation overwrites the next field's contents when using LLVM AOT #110820
  • [Android] [MonoAOT] Unify configuration between sample app and CI build #110811
  • Add an option so perf jit dump can optionally use TSC for timestamps. #110809
  • JIT: Swift register homing can be unified with general register homing #110808
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Record equality compare collection content only #110806
  • WASM MT: memory access out of bounds in System.Private.Xml.Tests #110805
  • Possible null reference exception in SslStream.Protocol #110804
  • Memory leak using SslStream in dotnet9 running on Linux #110803
  • Environment.ProcessPath hangs with exe path > MAX_PATH #110800

Closed

  • PhiDefinitions are not zero cost #88841
    Future
  • Remove `GTF_DEBUG_NODE_MORPHED`. #6218
    Future
  • [Android] CoreCLR uses APIs available only since Android API28 #110470
  • JsonIgnore attribute incompatible with .NET required keyword #110810
  • JIT fails to merge trivial blocks after jump threading #85547
    Future
  • Hang during AddRef/Release calls from GC callbacks for IReferenceTracker support #110747
  • NativeAOT doesn't pass the app manifest to the linker #110798
  • 在实操中采用Console.WriteLine方法输出派生类的基类引用出的基类成员时出现System.FormatException:“Input string was not in a correct format.错误，更改格式化方式后恢复正常 #110785
  • Extra memory used when attempting to JIT generics that have one or more structs as a generic type parameter or when accessed through an interface. #37143

PullRequests

Created

  • Exit the lock before we call into user code and handle losing the race for the RCW table #110828
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: Enable inlining for late devirtualization #110827
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Add `ccmp` and enable if-conversion for X86 #110826
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove unsafe code from IPAddress #110824
    area-System.Net
  • JIT: Optimize struct parameter register accesses in the backend #110819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][st] event pipe #110818
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Fix build with -DCLR_CMAKE_USE_SYSTEM_BROTLI=true #110816
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] Move ComWrappers AddRef to C/C++ #110815
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Change assembler to clang in android MonoAOT #110812
    os-android, area-Build-mono, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [main] Update icu dependencies and clean the manifest #110802
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Remove uses of DECODE_RETURN_KIND part of GCInfo #110799
    area-VM-coreclr, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix OSEncoding math overflow #110796
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • JIT: Generalize parameter register to local mapping in the backend #110795
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix race condition when cancelling pending HTTP connection attempts #110744
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • JIT: remove phis right after optimizing #110821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: revise how we track if nodes have been morphed #110787
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove FindFirstFile, FindNextFile and FindClose from PAL #110797
    area-PAL-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Remove workaround for fixed Roslyn bug in HttpHeaders #110790
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • Move ComWrappers AddRef to C/C++ #110762
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Change assembler to clang in android MonoAOT #110393
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Revert "Use FLS detach as thread termination notification on windows." #110801
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Tizen linux-armel build #110792
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove `FCThrow`s from Reflection APIs. #110766
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0

Updated

  • Enable Arm64 RDM on Windows #109493
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Build the "in build" crossgen2 into a pack that we can use within the VMR #110676
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use live apphost when publishing ilc as singlefile #105004
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [JIT] Improve x86 HWIntrinsic containment #110736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Chain `SIGSEGV` native crashes to the default `SIGSEGV` handler #110741
    area-Diagnostics-mono
  • [release/9.0-staging] [Profiler] Avoid Recursive ThreadStoreLock in Profiling Thread Enumerator #110665
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • [cDAC] Implement ISOSDacInterface::GetMethodDescPtrFromIp #110755
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Optimize JTRUE(cast_helper EQ/NE null) expansion #110272
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix race condition when cancelling pending HTTP connection attempts #110764
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix race condition when cancelling pending HTTP connection attempts #110765
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • Support generic fields in PersistedAssemblyBuilder #110372
    bug, area-System.Reflection.Emit, 10.0.0
  • Fix NativeAOT ThunksPool thunk data block size handling. #110732
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid array allocation in Task.WhenAll? #110777
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Use IRootFunctions in Tensor.StdDev #110641
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Update Stepping through GenericPInvokeCalli Stub under the Debugger #110677
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Bugfix InvalidOperationException/IndexOutOfRangeException in HttpListener.EndGetContext #110695
    area-System.Net, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Use FLS detach as thread termination notification on windows. #110629
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-consider, os-windows, area-VM-coreclr
  • Implement WriteStringValueSegment defined in Issue 67337 #101356
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Beginnings of native Android build #110471
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android
  • Use -pack switch instead of -allconfigurations to create packages #110778
    needs-area-label
  • Change RSA.LegalKeySizes for Apple platforms to return 8192 #110591
    area-System.Security
  • Avoid IndexOutOfRangeException in ZipArchive #109168
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Fix GetNormalizedLength on iOS and similar platforms #110723
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Fix a comment to match the function signature #110631
    area-VM-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-18
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Swift shipping] Implement tooling/bindings distribution using NuGet packages #2849
  • [Swift language features] Implement Swift enums in C# #2823
  • [SwiftBindings] ValueWitnessTable needs some changes #2881

PullRequests

Created

  • [SwiftBindings] prototype for SwiftOptional #2896
    area-SwiftBindings

Merged

  • [RuntimeAsync] Merge from upstream #2895
    area-async
  • [SwiftBindings] Extra enum-specific entries in ValueWitnessTable #2893
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [SwiftBindings] Add support for non-frozen structs #2870
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [SwiftBindings] Added accessors for TypeMetadata #2877

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add the `WasmComponentTypeWit` item group #2859
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Emit type debug info into a single module #2883
  • [Swift bindings] Add bindings experimental NuGet to the dotnet-experimental feed #2878
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet sln remove support for slnx #45556
    10.0.1xx
  • Add meta data to packagedownloads to enable future audit improvements #45555
    10.0.1xx
  • Invest in improvements to the SDK repo #45551
    10.0.1xx
  • [WPF] Regression - slow build times of WPF app #45546
  • [dotnet-watch] Consider using DefaultItemExcludes and DefaultExcludesInProjectFolder for directory exclusions #45539
  • [API Compat] Adding an ObsoleteAttribute or ExperimentalAttribute is not detected as a breaking change #45524
  • [dotnet-watch] MauiBlazor test fails on MacOS #45521
  • Github action fails trying to load dotnet-runtime-wasm-linux #45519

Closed

  • [NETE2ESDK] [Azure Linux ARM64] Installing .NET 10 alpha SDK in Mariner2 ARM64 2.0 or Azure Linux ARM64 3.0 should not depend on package netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1 #45499
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Track signature errors #42870
  • error MSB3231: Unable to remove directory #42963
  • Reenable templating tests for windows #41795
    10.0.1xx
  • Reenable static graph tests #13081
  • Reenable framework roslyn tests for 7.0.3xx branch #32737
  • Main branch net10.0 transition status tracking #42920
  • 'dotnet nuget why' option to show unique parent packages: --depth 1 #45464
  • Improve workload repair to actually fix a customers installation and manifests #31282
    9.0.2xx
  • Private dependencies appear in an app's deps.json file #39400
    9.0.1xx
  • Improve preview handling for `dotnet workload search version` #43890
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/6.0.4xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #45542
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/6.0.4xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #44915
  • dotnet watch run completely broken for F# #44908
  • dotnet sdk for net9.01 on macos because of unidentified developer #45523
  • DllNotFoundException: Unable to load DLL 'sni.dll': Access is denied. #7480
    Backlog
  • Regression from .NET 8: `dotnet run` on .NET 9 emits ANSI terminal codes when redirected #45262

PullRequests

Created

  • Hardcode manifest name when building source-only #45554
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't publish assets with Vertical visibility as part of the merged manifest for a vertical. #45553
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Warn on :: use in dotnet new install towards #45422 #45552
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove unused OverrideBootstrapVersions infrastructure #45550
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Port a set of test fixes from main to 9.0.2xx #45549
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update all test sdk references to the latest version. #45548
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45547
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support package@version syntax in dotnet new install, partial fix for #45422 #45545
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • Update Helix queues to osx.15.amd64|arm64 #45543
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove 'NETSDK1219' warning #45538
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable Nullable in Main Directory.Build.Props, Add #nullable disable to .cs Files, and Clean Up Redundant Configurations #45522
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • Split tests by method rather than class #45520
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • SDK should only depend on netstandard-targetingpack-2.1 on x64 #45540
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove source build support for test prereqs tarballs #45544
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.2xx] fix(cli): dotnet help new link opening #45404
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change Aspire RunSessionRequest definition #45515
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45427
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [9.0.2xx] sln migrate, sln list, sln add #45408
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add hook for importing .props file after .NET SDK props #45151
    consider-for-documentation
  • Use Agent.TempDirectory when building from archive in source-build #45532
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [VMR] Actually disable codeql on arm64 Mac #45528
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix missing test binlog #45480
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2603592 #45465
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [VMR] Disable codeql on arm64 mac builds #45511
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add support for `dotnet sln add file` and `dotnet sln add folder` #45072
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 10.0.1xx
  • Don't require there to be a supported runtime pack runtime identifier for crossgen2 #45487
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Use a crossgen2 that runs on the host for R2Ring in a VMR build #45463
    Area-Infrastructure, Blocked, untriaged
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-alpha.1.24612.1 #45435
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Invoke dotnet nuget why directly through API #44614
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Copy dump file to the Helix upload location #45345
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Prepare GenAPI so it can be used for a new assembly diff generator #45389
    untriaged, Team:Runtime, Area-Tools
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Restore detailed test logging to console output #45344
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [FIX] tool-update: Compare tool versions correctly #45383
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Add support for using Digest for base image #44461
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [dotnet-watch] Make pipe reads and writes fully async #45495
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable signing in the VMR official pipeline #45517
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Setup binskim globbing to artifacts/bin w/ workaround #45462
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • File watcher improvements #45131
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Do not create custom instances of TestAssetsManager in tests, use SdkTest base instead #45071
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-remove: Support for slnx #45160
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TestWorkspaceDiagnosticsWaitsForLspTextChangesWithMultipleSources is flakey #76503
    17.13
  • Parameters are not listed among completions for target-typed new expression inside return statement #76501
  • Signature help session is not triggered after typing comma in target-typed new expression inside return statement #76499
  • Expose synchronous SymbolFinder.FindSourceDefinition #76489
  • Surprising codegen for passing collection spread to span/readonlyspan taking method. #76488
  • Missing nullability warnings for semi-autoproperties #76487
  • IDE0130 false positive in extension method files. #76484

Closed

  • IDE0058 triggers on expressions with 'out' params #76477
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35617.104 #76481

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix sync over async blocking in tools|options #76511
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove sync over async blocking in Extract Method/Interface options code #76510
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • In addition to persisting the elfie index as a txt file, persist it as a binary file #76509
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove sync over async calls from within rename #76508
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove blocking async calls from sig-change #76507
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Only target NetCurrent for source build #76505
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Switch all of 'end construct' over to jtf. #76504
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Dictionary expressions: support concrete `Dictionary<TKey, TValue>` target type #76502
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Remove legacy signature help interaction code. #76495
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Propagate marked attributes from method type parameters to type parameters of synthesized types. #76492
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • FIx build errors with live (SCI) runtime dependencies when targeting NetPrevious (net9.0) in source-build (VMR) #76486
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Update Telemetry package version #76497
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Switch to jtf in end construct handling #76500
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Provide true-async and true-sync versions of GetTextChanges #76498
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Dictionary expressions: initial binding and lowering support #76257
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Make codepaths sync that don't need to be async #76490
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Switch to explicit jtf run #76494
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove sync over async blocking in workspace #76491
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Clean up blocking code in snippets #76482
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Filter out inline hint spans out of hte bounds of hte span we are querying for #76493
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove usage of WaitAndGetResult from debugger paths #76483
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update telemetry to 17.13.28 #76480
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove usage of WaitAndGetResult from debugger paths #76479
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove usages of WaitAndGetResult from object browser. #76478
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Do not report conflicting types errors for source-generated APIs #71546
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Allow OmniSharp to provide ImplementType Options #75312
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Propagate marked attributes from primary constructor parameters to backing fields. #76475
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add option for choosing stdio as the LSP communication channel #76437
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo #59555
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #59554
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_dapper, fortunes_dapper #59553
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, multiple_queries, single_query #59552
  • Error after update to 17.12.3 #59550
  • Getting Error In The Time Of Build Application #59549
  • Null reference exception when ASP .NET Core application is deployed to IIS #59547
  • How to make Blazor Server SignalR connection use a different URL? #59546
  • Missing 'value' attribute on native <input> tag when using 'InputDate' component #59541
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #59540
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef, multiple_queries #59539
  • possible memleak in internal CertificateManager #59538
  • Redundant checks in ResponseCachingKeyProvider #59537
  • Execption thrown when generating OpenAPI document using F# #59536

Closed

  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi. How can I detect when dotnet watch has hot reloaded? #59258
  • OpenApi will use System.ComponentModel.Attributes changed to Fluent mode. #59393
  • FromQueryAttribute fails to deserialize complex object if object is the same name as a containing property #59527
  • OpenIdConnectAuthenticationHandler: message.State is null or empty #55910
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #59530
  • Blazor WASM initial download timeout/retry #59522
  • Minimal API inconsistent results for 403 status code #59391
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json #59519
  • Perf regression: json_middleware #59520
  • OpenAPI generation leads to invalid openapi.json file #59496
  • .NET 9 - OpenAPI Not Generating Output #58805
  • ASP.NET Core 9.0: Swagger UI when returning async TypedResults shows Void under the schema #59324

PullRequests

Created

  • Add AuthN/AuthZ metrics #59557
    area-security
  • Fixed ownership mapping for the routing area #59556
    area-infrastructure
  • Use the live crossgen2 corresponding to the runtime we're building against #59551
    area-infrastructure
  • Removed unused areas #59548
    area-infrastructure
  • Fixed Bug 59396 for Camel/Compliant casing. #59545
    community-contribution, pr: pending author input, area-networking
  • Redis distributed cache: add HybridCache usage signal #59543
    area-middleware
  • Only generate specified document (#59097) #59535
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, feature-openapi
  • [release/9.0] Don't throw exception for parameters with custom binding source #59533
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc, feature-openapi, 9.0.x

Updated

  • Adds the ability to specify an appsettings file for user-jwts #58605
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution
  • Update testing analyzers #59516
    area-infrastructure
  • Correct typo in ProtectedPersonalDataAttribute.cs & PersonalDataAttribute.cs #58664
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT] perf: improve ManagedAuthenticatedEncryptor Decrypt() and Encrypt() flow #59424
    area-dataprotection
  • ALWAYS include the Vary Accept-Encoding header when response compression is enabled #55092
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Set IExceptionHandlerFeature on DeveloperExceptionPageMiddleware #52688
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • [release/9.0] Fix MultipartReaderStream synchronous read when using buffer offset #59422
    Servicing-approved, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0] Fix loading dotnet user-jwts config #59473
    Servicing-approved, area-commandlinetools, 9.0.x
  • Retry `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Core.Tests.Http2ConnectionTests.AbortSendsFinalGOAWAY` #59359
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-18
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [dsrouter] fix web socket startup #5121
  • Update metrics to support OpenTelemetry specification #5120

Updated

  • Distributed tracing support #5078

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Platform-specific build actions and functionality missing depending on the order of items in TargetFramework tag #26718
  • Wrong page routes in OnNavigated when using GoToAsync with a tab bar #26715
  • Setting Shell.CurrentItem does not trigger the OnNavigating event (only OnNavigated) #26714
  • iOS app crashes when calling GetValue on Virtual Property #26707
  • Enable the inheritance of the parent's BindingContext for Behaviors, based on a Flag #26705
  • [Windows] TableSection.Remove(Item) Removes all the Items from TableView instead of just removing the particular Item #26699
  • Expose styling for the tooltips #26695
  • [Windows] MAUI Label alignment not same in Windows 10 and Window 11 #26691
  • Starting from 9.0.12 TitleBar Missing From Modal Pages #26690
    .NET 9 SR2.2

Closed

  • Can't opt out of edetoedge opt out. #26683
  • [Windows] Switch always has a MinWidth of 154 #26700
  • MAUI vs-code can't recognized JDK #25906
  • Error Cannot create an IOS archive . Process cannot be executed on XMA server #25622
  • create xarchive with dotnet publish on windows #25149
  • Hot Reload does not seem to work #25637
  • How to change the size of MAUI Shell back button? For improved use when using tablets with gloves #26698
  • MAUI Entry in Windows always shows ClearButton despite ClearButtonVisibility set to 'Never' #25473
    Backlog
  • After updating to v9.0.21, the Preferences storage has been relocated from the LocalAppData folder to the AppData folder on the Windows platform. #26602
    .NET 9 SR2.2
  • [Android] Collection view has no scroll bar #25468
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • CollectionView shows no ScrollBar #11369
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 57 #26717
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 56 #26716
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr2] Revert "[Windows] `FileSystem.Current.AppDataDirectory` returns different path after updating to latest version - fix" #26713
    p/0, .NET 9 SR2.2
  • Fixed the ListView SelectedItem not cleared after the list is cleared #26712
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 55 #26710
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed CollectionView ScrollTo Method Crash with Invalid GroupIndex Value. #26706
    community ✨
  • Fixed the FlyoutPage.Flyout Disappearing When Maximizing the Window on Mac Platform #26701
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix up relevant CA1416 warnings - Set 1 #26696
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for CollectionView SelectedItem loses Background after opening and closing a Modal page #26694
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Navigation Toolbar Visibility Issue on Dynamic Flyout Reset in FlyoutPage. #26693
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • Revert "[Windows] `FileSystem.Current.AppDataDirectory` returns different path after updating to latest version - fix" #26685
    t/breaking 💥, area-essentials, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, .NET 9 SR2.2
  • [ci] Update global.json #26697
    area-infrastructure
  • Fixed [Windows] MAUI Entry in Windows always shows ClearButton despite ClearButtonVisibility set to 'Never' #25567
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Android] Fix for Softkeyboard Return key of an Entry control shows Done when the property ReturnType is set to Next #26501
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Android] Added a scroll bar for collection view #25471
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Testing] Enable snapshot tests on Catalyst #25710
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-testing

Updated

  • [ci] Add unit test jobs to dnceng builds #26623
    area-testing
  • [Android] Build maui.aar with the new AndroidGradleProject item #25632
    area-infrastructure
  • [ci] Update stable Android version #26684
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Windows] Optimize `LayoutHandler.Windows.cs` (take 2) #26460
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, community ✨, t/perf
  • Fix up relevant CA1416 warnings #26593
    partner/cat 😻, area-infrastructure
  • Fix more things with fonts (embedded) and unpackaged apps #26515
    area-fonts
  • Support for Setting Switch Off State Color #25068
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-switch, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] Shell toolbar items #20510
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] Using long-press navigation on back button with shell pages - fix #24003
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Add the scenario tests for the skiasharp backend #26591
    area-testing, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    platform/macOS 🍏, p/1, community ✨, area-controls-window, .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] Set height for EmptyView if is not an IView #26680
    area-controls-collectionview, i/regression, .NET 9 SR3
  • Change iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation mechanism #26629
    area-layout, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fix for CarouselView doesnot scroll corresponding to ItemsUpdatingScrollMode when collection modified #26608
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix SafeArea adjustments #25315
    area-layout, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • IndicatorView with DataTemplate - improvements #24776
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-activityindicator, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fix for TabBar Navigation does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS #21812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [iOS] CV - Reset ScrollOffset when item source changes #26376
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2
  • Templated indicator view - improvements #25642
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Enhanced Stepper to Support Dynamic Increment Mapping #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • The fix for child FlexLayout content appearing no longer works starting from version 8.0.61 #26665
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for Application Crash When Updating ToolbarItem Icon and Navigating Between Shell Pages #26126
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed iOS button flickering animation with is Top or Bottom ContentLayout when text it updated at run time #25662
    area-layout, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Keyboard Scrolling in editors with Center or End VerticalTextAlignment #25827
    community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment does not update at run time #25129
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Don’t call NSAttributedString with HTML from a background thread #26153
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, area-controls-label, .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] Transparent button border color when border color is not set #25373
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [Windows] Fix for SearchHandler Fails to Display Results. #26572
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 53 #26675
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed - [Windows] ListView Items Text Not Rendered inside the TabbedPage #26681
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] CollectionView with header and "complex" item will have the wrong position after a refresh with a RefreshView #26575
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Column name mismatch when adding new derived type to TPH #35352
  • Entity that owns multiple entities of the same type with navigations back to the owning type makes model construction fail #35346

Closed

  • Add dependency injection support to `IEntityTypeConfiguration` when using `ApplyConfigurationsFromAssembly` #35233
  • InvalidOperationException when LangVersion is set to preview #35100
    10.0.0
  • Missing Methods (Possibly AOT Trimmed) #35105
  • Cannot install Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Tool v9 on project #35348
  • How to save AuditEvent entities in the same transaction? #35345
  • Mapping entities with a foreign key value of 0 fails in EF 8.0.11 on Azure SQL #35238

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0-staging] Don't throw PendingModelChangesWarning when applying a specific migration #35353
    Servicing-approved
  • Basic setup of dev container. #35351
  • Cosmos: Create shadow property for id if key cannot be used #35347

Merged

  • Update dependencies and transform Span-based overloads to Enumerable in funcletizer #35339
  • Fix colors in activate.sh. #35350
  • Don't throw PendingModelChangesWarning when applying a specific migration #35343
  • Switch to SQL standard "boolean". #35349
  • More translation test cleanup (Random, DateTime.Parse/new, bitwise operators) #35341

Updated

  • Fix to #35239 - EF9: SaveChanges() is significantly slower in .NET9 vs. .NET8 when using .ToJson() Mapping vs. PostgreSQL Legacy POCO mapping #35326
  • Don't escape separator characters in single key values #35252
  • Translate to NULLIF #35327
